UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user profile on the SeaJourney Landing website.

id.description: Unique identifier for the UserProfile entity.

profilePicture.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

bio.description: A short biography or description of the user.

registrationDate.description: Date and time when the user registered.

role.description: The user's role, determining their permissions.

subscriptionStatus.description: The status of the user's subscription.

activeVesselId.description: The ID of the vessel the user is currently on.

activeSeaServiceId.description: The ID of the current active sea service record.

Vessel.title: Vessel
Vessel.description: Represents a vessel that a user has worked on.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Vessel entity.

type.description: The type of vessel (e.g., Motor Yacht, Sailing Yacht).

officialNumber.description: The official registration number of the vessel.

ownerId.description: The UID of the user who owns this vessel entry.

SeaServiceRecord.title: SeaServiceRecord
SeaServiceRecord.description: Represents a user's trip, either current or past.

vesselId.description: The ID of the vessel for the trip.

position.description: The user's position or role on the vessel.

startDate.description: The start date of the trip.

endDate.description: The end date of the trip. Null if current.

isCurrent.description: True if this is the currently active trip.

StateLog.title: StateLog
StateLog.description: Represents the vessel's state for a specific day.

date.description: The date for this log entry (e.g., '2025-11-30').

state.description: The state of the vessel for the given day.

migrated_at.description: Timestamp if the record was migrated.

Testimonial.title: Testimonial
Testimonial.description: Represents a testimonial or reference for a user.

VerificationRecord.title: VerificationRecord
VerificationRecord.description: Stores a snapshot of a verifiable record, identified by a unique code.

userId.description: The ID of the user this record belongs to.

recordType.description: The type of record being verified.

issuedAt.description: The timestamp when the verification record was created.

expiresAt.description: The timestamp when this verification code expires.

data.description: A snapshot of the key data from the verified record.

firestore.reasoning: This Firestore data structure is designed to support the SeaJourney application. User data is stored under a top-level `users` collection. Each user document contains their profile. Subcollections for `vessels` are used to store vessel information. Nested further, each vessel has `seaService` (for trip records) and `stateLogs` (for daily status) subcollections. This structure enforces data ownership through path-based security rules and keeps related data organized hierarchically.
